links.title: Audi To Begin Taking E-Tron SUV Reservations In U.S. On September 17
links.description: JUL 27 2018 BY VANJA KLJAIC For Audi, the transition to electric vehicles is one of the most important goals that the company has ever faced. With an ever-changing market, a complete change in the POV from car customers, joined by the dieselgate fallout, all make the German car maker eye EVs as the way out.

links.title: Tesla Solar Roof Mix-Up: What Went Wrong
links.description: Tesla builds fast, energy efficient cars and the company is becoming a force in making homes greener by producing and storing solar energy. But an LA man accuses Tesla of damaging his home, saying the company agreed to pump the brakes on installation of a solar energy system when the price suddenly increased by thousands of dollars.

links.title: The Guy Who Salvages Ruined Teslas and Puts Them Back on the Road
links.description: Tesla is a bit of a control freak when it comes to repairing its electric vehicles. If you try to buy parts to make your own repairs, they won't let you. The company views it as a way of protecting its reputation and ensuring quality.

messages.body:
$TSLA Teslarati: Tesla owner ‚Äòsummons‚Äô Model S into frighteningly narrow driveway in the city.
https://www.teslarati.com/tesla-model-s-summoned-narrow-space/

links.title: Tesla owner 'summons' Model S into frighteningly narrow driveway in the city
links.description: Tesla's Summon is an Autopilot convenience feature that allows owners of the electric car to command the vehicle from an app to move forward and backward, including parking itself into spaces that are quite narrow. As this Model S Summon video shows, the feature can still park like a champ even in ridiculously narrow areas.

messages.body:
$TSLA : Tesla finishes dead last in auto dealership ranking, stores found to be horrible at selling cars but‚Ä¶.
https://electrek.co/2018/07/27/tesla-store-auto-dealership-ranking/

links.title: Tesla finishes dead last in auto dealership ranking, stores found to be horrible at selling cars but...
links.description: That's actually exactly as designed by Tesla and CEO Elon Musk. The ranking is mostly based on the capacity of the dealerships to turn potential customers into buyers, but salespeople in Tesla's stores are not being very sales-oriented as they focus on education.

links.description: Tesla ( TSLA) is waging a war against critics, or more of a preschool temper tantrum, depending on whom you ask. This week, it was CEO Elon Musk calling the wah-mbulance on a blogger who criticized Tesla on Twitter and financial analysis site Seeking Alpha.

links.title: Apple and Tesla Earnings Take Center Stage: The Week Ahead
links.description: Time to put aside (briefly) that disastrous Facebook ( FB) second quarter earnings call. Here's what is on tap in the week ahead. Apple Inc. ( AAPL) is slated to release its earnings after the bell on Tuesday. According to FactSet, analysts believe that the company will announce earnings of $2.16 a share.
